briefTitle: BMS-790052 (Daclatasvir) Plus Peg-Interferon Alfa-2a and Ribavirin in Treatment-Naive Black/African-Americans, Latinos and White/Caucasians With Hepatitis C
officialTitle: Open-Label, Single Arm Evaluation of BMS-790052 (Daclatasvir) in Combination With Peg-Interferon Alfa-2a and Ribavirin in Black-African Americans, Latinos and White-Caucasians With Chronic Hepatitis C Genotype 1 Infection
summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the rates of sustained virologic response in each cohort (Black-African Americans, Latinos) in this study to historical rate.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Sustained Virologic Response at Post-treatment Week 12 (SVR12)
